item.title: tabindex
item.description: Hey Web Developers, how about when you add a login form to a page you ALWAYS add a tagindex attribute and make the username and password fields the first elements in the tabbing order. The internet thanks you, KTHXBYE. <p> <label for="user">Username</label><br /> <input name="user" tabindex="1" type="text" value="" /> </p> <p> <label for="pass">Password</label><br /> <input name="pass" tabindex="2" type="password" value="" /> </p> http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/interact/forms.html#adef-tabindex
